title: Week 2
description: This week, I designed my prelimilary prototype in storyboard form in Figma, formed a moodboard, and iterated the prototype UI based on suggestions from my friends and ChatGPT.

title: Week 1
description: This week, I presented my idea in class, built the project website, and fleshed out my idea into an incremental game with a more detailed storytelling. I've also created a Game Design Document with game design details and a project plan.
